msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at left and right. Kollesis near the left edge. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. Lines 818 and 824 both have a X in the left margin as checkmarks (?). (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Chairemon, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tbelles (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 247)

Heraklas, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 167)

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: " (Column) 20:;Chairemon, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tbelles, drachmas 8;;Hatres, son of Apollonios, grandson of Heraklas, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Abykis, son of Demas, grandson of Abykis, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus the older, grandson of Theabennis, mother Tamarres, obols 28;;Ptolemaios, son of Esouris, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Apynchis, grandson of Aunes, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Apitas, son of Chairemon, grandson of Apitas, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 8;;in total for the day, drachmas 112, obols9 of which for the 12th year drachmas 12;;(Mecheir) 10 likewise:;Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, priest of Harpochrates,;for the epistatikou of priests drachmas 24, additional charges drachmas 3, obols 3;;for gerron (?) drachmas 4, additional charges obols 2.5, rate 0.5 obol; in total drachmas 32;;(in the left margin between line 803-804): drachmas 32, obols 8.;Ptolemaios, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapsais, obols 28;;Mysthes, son of Teberis, grandson of Sambathion, mother Isidora, obols 28;;Onnophris, son of Petaus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema, drachmas 4;;Heras, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Didymarion, drachmas 4;;Kastor, son of Petheus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Herakleia, drachmas 12;;Petheus, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;in total for the day, drachmas 76, obols 6 of which from the aforementioned priests, drachmas 32, obols 8;;(Mecheir) 11 likewise:;Pasion, son of Kames, grandson of Petheus, mother Zoidous, drachmas 8;;Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Onnophris, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 4;;Heraklas, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis, drachmas 8;;Chairemon, son of Onnophris, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapontos, drachmas 20;;Polis, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Herais, drachmas 8;;Sambas, son of Peteesis, grandson of Apollonios, mother Tanomgeus, drachmas 8;;Sisois, son of Onnophris, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Sabeinos, son of Apynchis, grandson of Sambas, mother Thatres, drachmas 12;;12th year the same, copper obols 28;;Ptolemaios, son of Heras, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 8;;Sabeinos, son of Anchophis, grandson of Satabous, mother Thases, guard tax, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 96, obols 28 of which for the12 th year, obols 28, deposits drachmas 28;;(Mecheir) 12 likewise:;Teos, son of Mysthes, grandson of Anchophis, mother Tanais, drachmas 4;;Phaesis, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Polyndikos, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Kastor, son of Marres, grandson of Heras, mother Soeris, drachmas 8;;Syros, son of Onnophris, grandson of Maron, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 20;;Pnepheros, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Esouris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Zoidous, drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Aphrodisios, grandson of Onnophris, mother Tapetaus, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Besis, grandson of Thotes, mother Heras, obols 28;;Aphrodisios, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, drachmas 8;;Kastor, brother of the same mother, obols 28."
